Package net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators

Contains the core calculators implementing the <calculator> extension

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Calculator Abstract base class for all metrics calculators.
InheritanceDepth Calculates Depth of Inheritance Tree, Number of Children and sets superclasses to either 0 or 1 (if the source has subclasses)
LackOfCohesion Calculates the Lack of Cohesion of Methods (LCOM*) metric using the Henderson-Sellers method (See book page 147): (avg(m(a)) - m)/(1 - m) where m(a) is the number of methods that access a.
LackOfCohesion.Preferences Statically cache preference values, yet register for change events so they get updated when they change.
LinesOfCode Calculate number of real lines of code in a method.
McCabe Calculate McCabe Cyclomatic Complexity for a method.
NestedBlockDepth Calculate max nested block depth for a method
Norm Calculates number of overridden methods for a class.
Norm.Preferences Statically cache preference values, yet register for change events so they get updated when they change.
NumberOfAttributes Counts the number of attributes in a class.
NumberOfMethods Counts the number of methods in a class.
NumberOfParameters Counts the number of parameters for a method
RMartinCouplings Calculates the Robert Martin Coupling metrics (Ca, Ce, I, A and Dn);
RMartinCouplings.AfferentCollector Uses the jdt searchengine to collect all classes outside this package that depend on things inside this package, in other words, collect references to this package in the entire workspace, and do not count those found inside this package
RMartinCouplings.EfferentCollector  
SpecializationIndex Calculates the SI (NORM * DIT) / NOM.
 

Exception Summary
InvalidSourceException thrown by a Calculator if it is not applicable for the given source
 

Package net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators Description

Contains the core calculators implementing the <calculator> extension
